SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.nuklear

Class NkUserFont

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.nuklear.NkUserFont
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class NkUserFont extends Struct implements NativeResource

Layout


 struct nk_user_font {
     nk_handle userdata();
     float height();
     nk_text_width_f width();
     nk_query_font_glyph_f query();
     nk_handle texture();
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • NkUserFont

      public NkUserFont(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a NkUserFont instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
